short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The simplest way to organize your creative workflow.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Plot is the simplest way to organize your creative workflow.

We understand that when it comes to creative reviews — feedback lives everywhere. Sync feedback from your emails or slack (web app only) into your deliverable page on Plot to build a reliable source of truth to centralize project details. It’s the fastest and frictionless experience to update project details into your workspace. 

Plot is a visual project management platform for marketing teams to manage campaigns, integrate with creative workflows and collaborate with distributed teams. Quickly check project progress, access deliverables, provide feedback and approve — all in one.
